scripts.build:book: npm run make:book && npm run tidy
scripts.deploy: npm run build && rm -rf stores/wiki && git clone git@github.com:FabricLabs/wiki.git stores/wiki && rm -rf stores/wiki/.git && cp -rf stores/wiki/assets assets/wiki && http-server
scripts.docs: npm run make:api && npm run make:docs && http-server -p 8000 docs
scripts.make:all: npm run make:service && npm run make:app && npm run make:lib && npm run make:dev # && npm run make:binary
scripts.make:api: jsdoc2md --configure jsdoc.json --files types/*.js schemata/*.js services/*.js settings/deprecations.js README.md > API.md
scripts.make:app: ### ERROR: Not yet implemented.  Debug: `examples/app.js` to `assets/app.js`
scripts.make:coverage: npm run coverage && c8 report --reporter html
scripts.make:dev: npm run make:examples && npm run make:docs && npm run make:book && cp -rf docs _book/ && cp -rf examples _book/ && glob-run js-beautify --indent-size 2 -r _book/**.html
scripts.make:docs: npm run make:api && node_modules/.bin/jsdoc -c jsdoc.json services/**.js types/**.js settings/deprecations.js DEVELOPERS.md -d docs/ && glob-run js-beautify --indent-size 2 -r docs/**.html
scripts.make:lib: ### ERROR: Not yet implemented.  Debug: `scripts/fabric.js` to `assets/fabric.min.js`
scripts.make:service: ### ERROR: Not yet implemented.  Debug: ` examples/service.js` to `assets/service.js`
scripts.make:viewer: ### ERROR: Not yet implemented.  Debug: `components/circuit-viewer.js` to `assets/viewer.min.js`
scripts.report:coverage: npm run make:coverage && c8 report --reporter=text-lcov > reports/coverage.lcov
scripts.report:install:
rm -rf node_modules && echo "
" > package-lock.json && echo "$ npm i" > reports/install.log && npm i >> reports/install.log
scripts.reports: npm run report:install && npm run make:coverage && npm run report:todo
scripts.review:todo:
npm run report:todo && cat reports/TODO.txt && echo '
Outstanding TODO items (@fabric/core):' && wc -l reports/TODO.txt && echo '
Issues List: https://github.com/FabricLabs/fabric/issues
Disclosures: securiy@fabric.pub

'
scripts.test:app: npm run make:service && npm run make:app && NODE_ENV=test mocha tests/fabric.app.js
scripts.watch:book: honkit serve --port 8000 # NOTE: /docs and /examples may not be available.
